resources.string: Note - This is based on data collected from various reliable sources and none of these represent exact figures . Calorie and fat count are a rough estimate ,based on average computed from the data collected . Data sources-fitbits.com , Myfitnesspal.com , nutritioncharts.com , nutritionvalue.org

This is an app designed for all the fitness freaks out there. From to-do-workout list to BMI(Body Mass Index) calculator, it contains all the relevant features for setting up a daily exercise routine. Additionally, it contains informative content, pertaining to various fast-food items we often consume along with some videos giving some quick insights to adopting a healthy lifestyle. This app inculcates features which could help fulfill your fitness goals within a short period of time. You can keep a track of your health by updating biometrics and thereby analysing your Body Mass Index. Hope you have a great time with Mindblooming.
